scripts.dev:web: cross-env NODE_PATH=./ cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env DEBUG=web*,shared:middlewares* cross-env DIR=web nodemon --watch web/server.js --exec "flow-node" web/index.js
scripts.dev:api: cross-env NODE_PATH=./ cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env DEBUG=api*,shared:middlewares* cross-env DIR=api nodemon --watch api --ext js,graphql,json --exec "flow-node" api/index.js
scripts.build:shared: flow-remove-types shared --out-dir build/shared && cpy shared/prisma/types.graphql build/shared/prisma/
scripts.build:web: cd web && flow-remove-types --out-dir ../build/web index.js server.js && yarn build
scripts.postbuild:web: cp -r web/.next web/static build/web && cp web/package.json build/web/package.json && cp yarn.lock build/web/yarn.lock && cp now.json build/web/now.json
scripts.build:api: cpy --parents api/ build/ && flow-remove-types api/ --out-dir build/api/
scripts.postbuild:api: cp api/package.json build/api/package.json && cp yarn.lock build/api/yarn.lock && cp now.json build/api/now.json
scripts.start:web: cross-env NODE_PATH=./build cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env DIR=web node build/web/index.js
scripts.start:api: cross-env NODE_PATH=./build cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env DIR=api node build/api/index.js
